testcase.name: Delta LogIn
testcase.system-out: Given I am On Delta Home Page...............................................passed Then I click on Login Button................................................passed When I Click on Login Button I should see "Log In To Delta"...............passed Then I click on user name and send Key......................................passed Then I click on Password and send the key..................................passed And I Verify "All fields are required" Text.................................passed

testcase.name: Delta Travel Info
testcase.system-out: Given I am On Delta Home Page...............................................passed Then Mouse hover in Travel info.............................................passed When Mouse hover I select the Baggage and click.............................passed Then I should See "Baggage & Travel Fees"...................................passed Then I click on Track check on baggage......................................passed Then I verify "Check Bag Status"............................................passed And I click The Arrow Button To Know the bag Confarmation num num...........passed Then I click The confirmation number........................................passed And The Last Name I click...................................................passed

testcase.name: flight status checking
testcase.system-out: Given I am On Delta Home Page...............................................passed Then I click on from your origin............................................passed And I Type Jfk on the box...................................................passed Then From Drop down I select JFK New York Kennedy, Ny......................passed Then I click on from your destination.......................................passed And I type BHM on the From box..............................................passed Then I select BHM Birmingham Alabama........................................passed Then I verify"SEARCH OPTIONS" Text..........................................passed

testcase.name: Flight Status Checking One
testcase.system-out: Given I am On Delta Home Page...............................................passed Then I am Click on round trip drop down button..............................passed And I select One way........................................................passed Then I verify "THE DELTA CUSTOMER EXPERIENCE" on that page..................passed
